Unnamed: 9: That's another good question. Some rocks have different materials in them because they formed in different ways. For example, an igneous rock might form when molten lava cools and hardens. A sedimentary rock might form when sand and other particles settle into layers and then become cemented together over time. And a metamorphic rock might form when heat and pressure change the structure of an existing rock
